reviews.review_msg: This prof is a riot. He's funny, interesting, etc. However - 100 level psyc classes will MURDER you on the exams. I think this is their secret way of filtering out all the students from going on to upper level Psyc. Whatever the reason - its pretty stupid considering the money we pay for this.

I personally find the content interesting but when it comes to the midterms I freak out.  His lectures are easy to follow and the content in the book is relatively easy as well.  But the midterms are hideous!  The M/C is reasonable....sometimes, but the essay portion is difficult.  His expectations are way too high.

Exams (multiple choice and essay) are extremely hard. Way too much stuff to memorize. If you read the text properly you can do well. His lectures were all over the place. I ignored his lectures and read the text and did well. He's a funny guy, sometimes hes boring. 102's material is better than 100's.

I hated the way Day taught the class. His lectures were really boring and not helpful. I will never take another class with him, I learned everything on my own anyways. The marking for the long answer midterm questions was unfair. The finals (both for 100 and 102) were also really hard.
Hard prof. He was great at first unitl he made me cry.
